overview: Wai dreams to buy all the brand-name dresses. Se works in a boutique and met designer Billy, they hook up very soon. Since the owner of the boutique, Sandy was sick, she asks Wai for help to run the business. Chan, Sandy's husband likes to sexually harasses the staff; accidentally hooks up with Wai, afterward Wai force Chan to get devoices from Sandy. Also convince Chan to invest a huge budget of dress. Chan bankrupt and was forced to sell the boutique to a mystery buyer. Wai broke up with Chan, and the mystery buyer was......
title: Fashionholic
